SEARCH
Module com.example.loginpage
Package com.example.loginpage.controller.observe

Interface FavouritesObservable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookDAO
public interface FavouritesObservable
Interface for objects that can observe changes in the list of favourite books. This interface defines methods for adding and removing observers, and for notifying them when books are added or removed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addObserver(FavouritesObserver observer)
    Adds an observer to the list of observers.
    void
    notifyObserversBookAdded(Book book)
    Notifies all registered observers that a book has been added to the favorites list.
    void
    notifyObserversBookRemoved(Book book)
    Notifies all registered observers that a book has been removed from the favorites list.
    void
    removeObserver(FavouritesObserver observer)
    Removes an observer from the list of observers.

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(FavouritesObserver observer)
      Adds an observer to the list of observers. This observer will be notified of any changes to the favourites list, such as adding or removing books.
      Parameters:
      observer - The FavouritesObserver to be added to the list. Must not be null.

    • removeObserver

      void removeObserver(FavouritesObserver observer)
      Removes an observer from the list of observers. After deletion, the observer will no longer receive notifications About changes in the list of favourites.
      Parameters:
      observer - The FavouritesObserver to be removed from the list. Must not be null.

    • notifyObserversBookAdded

      void notifyObserversBookAdded(Book book)
      Notifies all registered observers that a book has been added to the favorites list. Each observer's onFavoriteBookAdded method will be called.
      Parameters:
      book - The book that has been added to the favorites list. This book is not null.

    • notifyObserversBookRemoved

      void notifyObserversBookRemoved(Book book)
      Notifies all registered observers that a book has been removed from the favorites list. Each observer's onFavoriteBookRemoved method will be called.
      Parameters:
      book - The book that has been removed from the favorites list. This book is not null.
